Lack of evidence or citations: The expert's verdict highlights that the claim made by GotNews.com lacks any evidence or citations to support their assertion that Jesus Campos was an accomplice to the Las Vegas Strip mass shooter.
Confirmation from law enforcement: The expert's verdict mentions that high-ranking officials from the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department have repeatedly confirmed that, based on their investigation, Stephen Paddock was the only shooter involved in the mass shooting. This contradicts the claim made by GotNews.com.
Anonymous source: GotNews.com relies on an anonymous "official" from the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) to support their claim. The lack of transparency in the source raises doubts about the credibility of the information presented.
Disputed information: The ATF has explicitly stated that the information presented in the GotNews.com article is incorrect, further undermining the authenticity of the claim.
